resources.string: There seems to be no text detected on the camera
Please enable wifi or mobile data if you want to use text to speech
Please enable wifi or mobile data if you want to see about me content
Are You Sure You want to Quit?
readit is reading your captured text!

Readit need the Camera Permission to operate. Readit would only use the camera to detect texts that is on the camera at real time. Therefore, it would be wise if the user would allow readit to use the camera. Please allow camera permission from the settings or at the start-up screen of the readit app
